chapter.title: OpenStack Block Storage
chapter.para: The Block Storage project works with many different storage drivers. You can configure those following the instructions.

section.title: Setting Configuration Options in the cinder.conf File
section.para: The configuration file cinder.conf is installed in /etc/cinder by default. A default set of options are already configured in cinder.conf when you install manually.
